Aficionado's Premium Cigars & Wine
90 Google reviews
Write a review
Malachi Hudson
2025-03-13
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Incredibly helpful staff. I was curious about trying out cigars, Rick helped me out and told me what I should try. He gave me some free materials to get started as well. Very incredible selection of cigars. I was a bit disappointed that there were not any pipes, but it makes sense that there's not much of a market for them. Great place for sure!
R-CONTENT
S C
2025-02-19
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Awesome place to buy cigars and chill out üî•üî•
R-CONTENT
Chandler Obradovich
2024-11-24
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
How much is a case of romeo and Juliet cigars
R-CONTENT
rrenegde
2024-11-22
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Great selection first time there. Will be back !
R-CONTENT
Mez Pierre
2024-10-20
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Aficionado is a premium cigar lounge located in Coral Springs. It provides an ideal environment for relaxation and enjoyment. The establishment is characterized by its cleanliness, comfort, and friendly atmosphere. The owner possesses extensive knowledge and expertise regarding the products offered. Patrons consistently express positive experiences and satisfaction during their visits.
R-CONTENT
Kyleigh Sprigle
2024-09-26
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Aficionados is my favorite wine shop in the area! My boyfriend loves the cigar selection and you can enjoy a drink and/or smoke while you‚Äôre there. There‚Äôs a huge selection of wine and cigars so you can find something for everyone. My first time in the shop, I was looking for a wine pairing for bacon-wrapped filets, and the owner Gary knew exactly which wine would suit the dish right away! And it was incredible, he is knowledgeable on each and every wine.

Since then I have been a regular customer there. The customer service is great and I really love the atmosphere. Any pairing or recommendation I need I know I can trust Gary and any staff member. The wine selection is hand-picked by the owner and not too expensive. This is a small business and truly a hidden gem!

When I want to try a new wine or my boyfriend wants a good cigar we shop here. When I buy gifts for Christmas, Thanksgiving, birthdays, Father‚Äôs Day, and Mother‚Äôs Day I usually find myself here too lol. They told me about events coming up and I am so excited to see what they do! Anyways, Live Laugh Love Aficionados!
R-CONTENT
ThePresadog
2024-04-27
Trustindex verifies that the original source of the review is Google.
R-CONTENT
Great service and took extra time with me as I am just starting out. Huge selection and a very comfortable shop
R-CONTENT

About Aficionados Store
Aficionados Coral Springs, FL ‚Äì¬† Premium Cigar & Wine
Your Premier Destination for Fine Cigars and Exquisite Wines in Coral Springs
At
Aficionados Cigar and Wine Store
, we believe that the best moments in life are meant to be savored. Whether you‚Äôre an experienced connoisseur or new to the world of cigars and fine wines, we offer an unparalleled selection of premium products to elevate your experience.
Aficionados-Coral-Springs-Store
Located in the heart of
Coral Springs, FL
, Aficionados is more than just a cigar shop ‚Äì it‚Äôs a
haven for enthusiasts
who appreciate quality, craftsmanship, and community. Our curated collection features some of the world‚Äôs most sought-after
hand-rolled cigars
,
rare vintages
, and
top-tier accessories
, ensuring that every visit is a journey into the art of indulgence.
A Tradition of Excellence
With years of expertise in the industry, our team is passionate about providing
personalized service and expert recommendations
. Whether you‚Äôre searching for the perfect cigar to celebrate a milestone or a bold red wine to pair with a special occasion, we take pride in offering
a tailored experience
for every customer.
The Ultimate Lounge Experience
Aficionado‚Äôs in Coral Springs
is more than a retail store. It‚Äôs an exclusive lounge experience. Step into a sophisticated space where you can relax, unwind, and savor your favorite cigar or a glass of fine wine. Our lounge is open to clients looking to enjoy exceptional moments in great company and comfort.
Aficionados-Coral-Springs-Store
Aficionados-Coral-Springs-Store
Discover the Aficionados Difference
Step into
Aficionados Cigar and Wine Store
and discover why we are
Coral Springs‚Äô top destination
for those who appreciate the finer things in life. Whether you‚Äôre here to explore our collection, enjoy a cigar with fellow aficionados, or find the perfect gift, we are committed to making every visit memorable.
üìç
Visit us today
and let us help you find your perfect pairing!
